text: Approval for the cobas 4800 braf v600 mutation test.  This device is indicated for:  the cobas 4800 braf v600 mutation test is an in vitro diagnostic device intended for the qualitative detection of the braf v600e mutation in dna extracted from formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded human melanoma tissue.  The cobas 4800 braf v600 mutation test is a real-time pcr test on the cobas 4800 system, and is intended to be used as an aid in selecting melanoma patients whose tumors carry the braf v600e mutation for treatment with vemurafenib.
